Title: Ink
Plot: Peter faces unexpected consequences for his heroic acts and encounters a reluctant new hero. As Claire continues to adjust to college life, she must figure out how to deal with her ability having been revealed. Meanwhile, Samuel moves heaven and earth to recapture the memories of his late brother Joseph. Elsewhere, Matt struggles with his internal demons as Sylar mysteriously resurfaces.
GuestStars: Louise Fletcher, Madeline Zima, Deanne Bray, Rick Worthy, Dawn Olivieri, Daniel Newman, Assaf Cohen
